jobTitle: Import Operations Manager (5+ yrs. mgmt req; NVOCC exp. req.)
description:
Job Description

Import Operations Manager

Location: Cerritos, CA

Salary: $70,000 - $75,000 + Benefits

Benefits: Health, Dental, 401k + match, Holidays, PTO

Job Type: Full-Time & Onsite

Typical Hours: 8:30 am – 4 pm PT

Start Date: ASAP

Sponsorship is not available

Import Operations Manager Description

Our client in the Ocean Freight industry is looking for an Import Operations Manager to add to their team in Cerritos, CA. Reporting to the General Manager, you will be responsible for managing the import/export team ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction. In this role, you will guide team members with updated training, delegate and assign tasks, support issues that arise, and troubleshoot any urgent matters. To succeed in this role, you must have a minimum of Five years of experience in Ocean Transportation and NVOCC (Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier) with 3 of those years as a manager/supervisor. This is a great opportunity to join a company that prides itself on employee and client satisfaction.

Import Operations Manager Responsibilities

Communicate between clients and overseas for booking reports

Manage the import/export cargo team (10 people)

Ensure communication with overseas offices runs smoothly

Track and trace shipments keeping customers well informed of any changes

Maintain documentation and records according to paperless protocol

Support staff in bookings with carriers

File necessary government documentation required based on commodity

Back-fill any staff as needed

Support the team with issues that arise

Work cross-functionally with operations and sales to ensure client satisfaction

Import Operations Manager Qualifications

5+ years of Ocean Transportation experience required

3+ years of Import Operations Management experience required

Strong knowledge of NVOCC required

Proficiency in Microsoft Office required
